factor.description: The aggravating factor explicitly addressed by the judge. Refugee/Asylum: Refugee or asylum seeker status; Illegal immigrant: Illegal immigrant status; On bail: Offending while on bail; Suspended sentence: Offending during suspended sentence or probation; CSD supervision: Offending while under Correctional Services Department supervision; Wanted: Offending while wanted; Persistent offender: Repeat/persistent offender; Import: Cross-border drug trafficking - import; Export: Cross-border drug trafficking - export; Use of minors: Using minors in trafficking; Multiple drugs: Dealing in more than one type of dangerous drugs; Role of the defendant: Aggravation due to the role of the defendant.

other_factor.description: The mitigating factor if the factor is 'Other'
other_factor.title: Other Factor

enhancement.description: The specific sentence enhancement in months due to this aggravating factor, or null if the judge acknowledged the factor but decided not to impose enhancement
enhancement.title: Enhancement

source.description: The exact match source text from which the aggravating factor was extracted. Do not include any additional information in the source document.
source.title: Source

charge_no.description: Charge number provided in the system prompt
charge_no.title: Charge No

type.description:
Type of charge:
Actual Trafficking: Trafficking in a dangerous drug/dangerous drugs or 
Conspiracy to Traffic: Conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug/dangerous drugs 
**Ignore other types of charges**

defendant_name.description: Name of the defendant associated with this charge
defendant_name.title: Defendant Name

defendant_id.description: ID of the defendant associated with this charge, as provided in the prompt
defendant_id.title: Defendant Id

source.description: The exact match source text from which the charge type was extracted. Do not include any additional information in the source document.
source.title: Source

other_drug_type.description: If the drug type is 'Other', provide the most drug type specified in the source text.
other_drug_type.title: Other Drug Type

quantity.description: Quantity of the drug in grams
quantity.title: Quantity

source.description: The exact match source text from which the drug type and quantity was extracted. Do not include any additional information in the source document.
source.title: Source

guilty_plea_reduction_years.description: The reduction due to the defendant's guilty plea - years component
guilty_plea_reduction_years.title: Guilty Plea Reduction Years

guilty_plea_reduction_months.description: The reduction due to the defendant's guilty plea - months component (0-11)
guilty_plea_reduction_months.title: Guilty Plea Reduction Months

source.description: The exact match source text from which the final sentence was extracted. Do not include any additional information in the source document.
source.title: Source

court_type.description: The court where the plea was entered, Must have if pleaded_guilty is True

high_court_stage.description: Must have if court_type is High Court. Unknown: Stage unknown; Up to committal: Up to committal in Magistrates' Courts; After committal: After committal and up to and until trial dates are fixed; After dates fixed: After trial dates are fixed but before the first date of trial; First day: First day of trial; During trial: During the trial.

district_court_stage.description: Must have if court_type is District Court. Unknown: Stage unknown; Plea day: At plea day; After dates fixed: After trial dates are fixed but before the first date of trial; First day: First day of trial; During trial: During the trial.

source.description: The exact match source text from which the guilty plea information was extracted. Do not include any additional information in the source document.
source.title: Source

factor.description: The mitigating factor explicitly addressed by the judge (excluding guilty plea). Voluntary surrender: Defendant voluntarily surrendered to authorities; Self-consumption: Self-consumption of significant proportion of drugs; Assistance - limited: Of some limited help to authorities but unfruitful; Assistance - useful: Useful assistance leading to arrest/conviction of another accused; Assistance - testify: Testified in court successfully against another accused; Assistance - risk: Assisted authorities at considerable personal risk; Extreme youth: 15 years old or below; Young offender: 16-20 years old; Medical conditions: Defendant's medical conditions; Family illness: Family illness or tragedy; Prosecutorial delay: Delay in prosecution; Mistaken belief: Mistaken belief about drug type; Rehabilitation programme: Participation in anti-trafficking or rehabilitative programmes.

other_factor.description: The mitigating factor if the factor is 'Other'
other_factor.title: Other Factor

reduction.description: The specific sentence reduction in months due to this mitigating factor, or null if the judge acknowledged the factor but decided not to impose reduction
reduction.title: Reduction

source.description: The exact match source text from which the mitigating factor was extracted. Do not include any additional information in the source document.
source.title: Source

reduction_months.description: Total sentence reduction in months granted based on mitigating factors (excluding guilty plea reduction)
reduction_months.title: Reduction Months

source.description: The exact match source text from which the mitigation reduction was extracted. Do not include any additional information in the source document.
source.title: Source

source.description: The exact match source text from which the notional sentence was extracted. Do not include any additional information in the source document.
source.title: Source

role.description: Role of the defendant in the trafficking operation. Courier: Transporter of drugs; Storekeeper: Responsible for storage or warehousing; Lookout/scout: Person monitoring for law enforcement or rivals; Actual trafficker: Directly sells or distributes dangerous drugs to the public; Manager/organizer: Coordinator or planner of trafficking activities; Operator/financial controller: Making substantial gains from drug trafficking; International operator/financial controller: Organiser or controller of a large and lucrative commercial operation which transcends jurisdictional boundaries.

source.description: The exact match source text from which the role was extracted. Do not include any additional information in the source document.
source.title: Source

sentence_years.description: Sentence after role adjustment - years component
sentence_years.title: Sentence Years

sentence_months.description: Sentence after role adjustment - months component (0-11)
sentence_months.title: Sentence Months

source.description: The exact match source text from which the sentence after role was extracted. Do not include any additional information in the source document.
source.title: Source

sentence_years.description: Starting point of sentence - years component
sentence_years.title: Sentence Years

sentence_months.description: Starting point of sentence - months component (0-11)
sentence_months.title: Sentence Months

source.description: The exact match source text from which the starting point was extracted. Do not include any additional information in the source document.
source.title: Source

drugs.description: Types and quantities of drugs involved **in the current charge**
drugs.title: Drugs

roles.description: Roles of the defendant in the offence **in the current charge**
roles.title: Roles

aggravating_factors.description: Aggravating factors explicitly addressed by the judge for the current charge
aggravating_factors.title: Aggravating Factors

mitigating_factors.description: Mitigating factors explicitly addressed by the judge for the current charge (excluding guilty plea)
mitigating_factors.title: Mitigating Factors

starting_point.description: Starting point of sentence based on drug type and quantity for the current charge

sentence_after_role.description: The sentence taking into account the role of the defendant for the current charge

notional_sentence.description: Notional sentence (starting point plus enhancement due to aggravating factors) for the current charge

mitigation_reduction.description: Sentence reduction granted based on mitigating factors for the current charge (excluding guilty plea)

final_sentence.description: Final sentence for the charge including any guilty plea reduction for the current charge

trials.description: List of trials for each charge against the defendant pairs, there could be multiple charges per defendant, one charge to multiple defendants, or multiple charges to multiple defendants.
trials.title: Trials
